How to do strategy research via backtesters

This is a collection of examples showing how to do strategy research through backtesters, how to plot results, how to perform strategy parameter optimization.


  • Simple trend following strategy using two moving averages

  • Using financial indicators from ta-lib in strategies

  • Multi-time frame strategy

  • Locating ohlc bars in trading days

  • Persist information in context across trading days

  • Trading two instruments

  • Multiple-bar arrival event

  • Timer in strategies

  • Getting market periods for instruments

  • Combining backtesting reports

  • Walk-forward optimization

  • Iterating over a data source directly

  • Using the plain backtester

  • Strategy with zeromq logger

  • Use external data source in backtesting

  • Strategy mission control

  • starterkit_ipython/
